definition: gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi
pad/cushion/mat/to pad out/to fill a gap/to pay for sb/to advance (money)

sentences.english: We took a hovercraft across the English Channel.
sentences.chinese: 我們乘氣墊船橫渡英吉利海峽。

sentences.english: If we didn't have it, I guess I couldn't get up again.
sentences.chinese: 如果我們沒有氣墊牀，我猜我可能不會再起來了。

sentences.english: The cushioned soles are great for when you land after a lay up .
sentences.chinese: 這些氣墊可以讓你在上籃後完美落地。

sentences.english: Additional lifejackets and flotation cots for small children and babies will be given out by the cabin crew.
sentences.chinese: 機組人員會爲孩子和嬰兒提供附加的救生衣和氣墊牀。

sentences.english: It's floating on its own air cushion.
The air-cushion vehicles lift/propulsion system is a complicated and non-linear system.
sentences.chinese: 氣墊船墊升推進系統是一個複雜的非線性系統。

sentences.english: What advantages has the hovercraft over the aeroplane?
sentences.chinese: 氣墊船有什麼優於飛機的地方？

sentences.english: Thank god, we bought a very good air bed.
sentences.chinese: 感謝上帝，我們已經買了一個非常好的氣墊牀。

sentences.english: So you want your very own hovercraft?
sentences.chinese: 你想擁有自己的氣墊船麼？

sentences.english: Fabric lined with a cushioned footbed for overall comfort.
sentences.chinese: 與整體舒適的氣墊鞋底內襯的面料。

sentences.english: The article describes the design and calculation of air-cushion piler at the rear end of the cross-cut shear in cold rolling mills.
sentences.chinese: 簡要介紹冷軋機橫切機組尾部氣墊垛板的設計計算。

sentences.english: Install right air cushion for backrest.
It's time to go home, let the air out of the air bed.
sentences.chinese: 該回家了，咱們把氣墊牀的氣兒放了吧。

sentences.english: Look, I can be a hovercraft.
sentences.chinese: 這是我第一次看見氣墊船。

sentences.english: Structural study of plenum chamber of air-cushion belt conveyor;
sentences.chinese: 設計氣墊膠帶輸送機的關鍵是準確計算基本參數。

sentences.english: Discovering and understanding the many benefits of luxury and convenience from a Quality Air Mattress Bed.
sentences.chinese: 發現和理解的許多好處和方便豪華的質量氣墊牀。

definition: to try sth out/to be on probation
to flow freely (of air)/to ventilate/to breathe (of fabric etc)/to take a breath of fresh air/to divulge
outfit or suit (of clothes)/set of coordinated items/kit
